A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The cat, left to love the sky and the love that will never love, has just lived. Well, until he spares one and loves her again. A love that will never love, but it is a love that greatly resembles a love that resides within, if you know love, you know Love,
